title: Longlegs
review: It wears its influences on its sleeve: The Silence of the Lambs, Se7en, Zodiac and Twin Peaks. I liked how it leaves so much unanswered and hints subtly at other details, like Mr Legs' rocker past, and the degree to which the protagonist was in control of her life. Nic Cage was good in it, but the design and performance of the mother character was amazing.
